Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 26th overall pick, by Colorado in 2004...
Traded from Colorado to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2007 (Going to COL: P J. Devine. Going to PIT: P J. Blevins, P K. Earhart)...
Earned first career win on 5/18/2011...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/4/2012, off Scott Williamson (SEA)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Milwaukee on 6/30/2017 (Going to MIL: P J. Blevins. Going to PIT: RF R. Tanaka)...
Injured on 7/1/2020 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
